website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but might be the best choice if you have a car that needs custom-fit floor mats.
pros: Easy to trim, catches dirt and liquids well, and will last for life of your car
cons: More expensive than most competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2018 Honda CRV as I didn’t want to spend $180 from the dealership. These work fine for me. Keeps the Georgia sand off my floors! Easy to clean and seem pretty durable. NOTE: They don’t fit your car perfectly. They are meant to be trimmed to fit and aren’t made specifically for your car. As long as you are okay with that, these will work for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: I used these in a 2016 Volt until the laser measured front floor pans were available.
customer_reviews.text: These need to be trimmed to fit a 2016 Volt. I wasn't entirely satisfied with the fit achieved for the drivers floor mat. Hint: I you are replacing factory mats because they are made of easily soiled carpet, use them as templates for cutting theses rubber mats instead of estimating it by the fit and cut method. After Weather Tech produced laser-measured floor pans for the front positions, I bought those. The rear rubber mats are perfect on the rear floors and will remain in use.
customer_reviews.author: -Pete

customer_reviews.title: Color darker than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2019 Honda CRV EX-L. Just put them in the car and they fit without any trimming needed. Based on their pliability, heft and lack of any odor, I think they will be durable and a true value buy in the long run. (In my 2017 civic the driver floor mat wore thru at the right heel landing spot and then a bit of the carpet beneath so I didn’t wasn’t that again. ) My only disappointment out of the box is that the color is much darker than the ad indicates; to me it is more brown than tan. I’ll post a pic so you can judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: OnAccount

customer_reviews.title: BMW 5 Series
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these mats. After reading so many reviews (most good, some bad) I decided to take a chance and just order them. I'm glad I did. They do not look cheap, they fit the area, they're heavy and rugged, and I didn't pay $130. Perhaps the bad reviews came from those with larger vehicles like SUVs.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Female

customer_reviews.title: Nice materials, undersized
customer_reviews.text: I’m familiar with trim-to-fit floormats. These are of good quality. For the particular vehicle I got these for though (05 toyota matrix) there was virtually no cutting to be done as these are undersized, spanning at best 7/8 the area untrimmed. With snow around the corner, we shall see how effective that limited coverage really is, and if I was right to trust this brand again, or if I should have spent a third as much on generic...
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing floor mats
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t want to pay for the original mats that come with your car, this is probably the best way to go. It might even be better. For around $50, you can get a pretty close to custom fit. My recommendation is to remove sections from the top first, and only after you are sure that the mat is exactly where you want it, with accounting for the floor hook. I am very happy with how my mats are now and the appearance looks perfectly customized to my floors with practically no floor mat movement for around a month. It’s as good as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: T. F. Dieterich

customer_reviews.title: The item received was not what was pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I received an item that was substantially dissimilar to what was advertised. The item ordered was a set of black, WeatherTech brand floor mats, however, what I received was not WeatherTech brand. The mats were black, of poorer quality, and smaller. In addition, the back floor mat was one single piece to be trimmed down, rather than the pictured two, individual mats. Finally, the mats did not have the WeatherTech brand or logo imprinted anywhere, indicating that these were either knock-offs in hopes that someone wouldn't notice, or a genuine shipping error. I initiated a return today and will order direct from WeatherTech. Please see the attached photos for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy floor mats
customer_reviews.text: I have seen ads about the custom mats by Weathertech, but I didn't want to invest that much, as I was buying them for my 2008 Explorer. These mats are heavy weight, and look like they will stand up for a long time. I haven't tried cleaning them yet, but I'm sure it won't be a problem. The rear seat mats fit perfectly, and the front mats are a pretty good fit, too. I didn't want to trim them in case I get a new vehicle. All in all, they are worth the money, and I think they will be much better than store-bought mats.
customer_reviews.author: bj in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Weathertech quality just not fitted
customer_reviews.text: Great mats. Had the fitted ones for my escape and put the trim to fit universal ones in my 2010 Mercury Grand Marquis. No trimming required but the rear ones might need to be trimmed for your Grand Marquis. I was happy with the fit but the COULD be trimmed but I'll leave them as is. Wish weathertech made fitted ones, but for the price these are very nice. Would reccomend if they dont have fitted mats for your model.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our Ford Expedition. No cutting needed, it fits perfectly front and back. The cost was astounding for the quality. We had Weathertech mats in our Dodge Durango for years and were familiar with the higher priced quality so this was a very pleasant surprise. Recommend this even if you do have to cut it a bit. The mats are super soft so cutting should be easy.
customer_reviews.author: NDGuy

customer_reviews.title: 2008 GX470
customer_reviews.text: I have the base model, this fits fairly well. For $45 it’s a deal. The rear pads are a little small and the passenger front didn’t need any trimming at all. The front driver requires some trimming but fits nicely. I didn’t use the carpet tracks because it seems like it will hold fine without them. It’s a buy!!
customer_reviews.author: frankO

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thouhtt I had ordered. Advertised as Weather Tech but not
customer_reviews.author: Grump

customer_reviews.title: Not great for BMW F25 X3
customer_reviews.text: These mats seem durable and fit the passenger side and rear decently without trimming. The drive side is a different story. Took a lot of trimming and it’s still not a great fit. I can live with it, but with I would have sprung for the custom ones now.
customer_reviews.author: dhstud76

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Floor Matts.  Much Better than Cheap Carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Much better than what came with my car from the dealer. Solid, strong and easy to trim as necessary which was very little for my 19 Honda Insight. The only reason not giving 5 stars are two things. 1. They were folded in half in a USPS box rather than shipped in a box the right size. I had to let them sit out for a bit to straighten back out. 2. The Auger anchors that came for the driver's side where very cheap and would not bite through the carpet to hold them in place. I ended up bending them to the point they were useless trying so I just did not use that part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2003 Chevy Tracker fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mats for a 2003 Chevy Tracker. The price was right and the delivery time was within am4mday period. The 2 rear mats fit without any trimming what so ever. The driver side needed only trimming for the foot rest and the passenger side only needed a little trim on the bottom left side other wise they fit like a glove. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These are ok for an older model like mine if you don't want to spend the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd rather spend the extra and get the custom fit. These are ok for an older model like mine if you don't want to spend the extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: N. G. Feb

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 2017 Kia Sedona
customer_reviews.text: Easy to trim and shape to your vehicle. We didnt use the carpet hooks that came with it says the undersides are textured and clung to the carpet of my car. They stay in place well and keep my car clean. Good price and value if you don't want to pay for custom mats.
customer_reviews.author: rach.lynn6

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Give this consideration.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality replacement car mats, and very attractive. Do watch the WeatherTech installation video and your own install will be a breeze. I had mine installed in about 15 minutes. Take your time with it to avoid mistakes. My own passenger side & rear mats needed no trimming at all. This set was reasonably priced considering the high quality, and I had considered several from the local AutoZone store. Very highly recommended. Nicer quality than the original floor mats that came with my 2009 Honda Accord.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: too small, other than that they work well.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and easy to clean; a little bit of sliding but could be worse. My main complaint is the size. I have a Prius; these mats are small even for my small car. They must fit one of those tiny Fiats, didn't need to trim them!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a well made trim to fit mat
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an all weather mat that was less expensive than the digital fit WeatherTech's for occasional use my performance sedan. These trim to fits worked quite well and fit the floors with only minimal trimming. The material is good quality and almost tacky feeling, they definitely don't slip. Only downside is not being able to reuse the OE mat retainers which are far nicer than the J hooks with these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Special Ops Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to custom trim to your application.
customer_reviews.text: For my 97 ranger pick up. Its easy to trim because the rubber is soft. The downside is it wears a bit faster. Still, I'd buy it again as it's a terrific value and a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: homertoeclipper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wanted a good quality mat but didn’t need the laser fit. These were perfect. Used the old mat as a template and had a great fit in a few minutes. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: nice mats.....but
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the construction of mats, had to return, color was way too dark for what I would consider tan. Bummer really like weathertech products.
customer_reviews.author: TONY WOLKEN

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to customize
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quality product. It was easy to trim and customize using a pair of scissors to fit my 2019 Alfa Romeo Giulia. I used my original floor mat as template for customization. After customization it fits so well nobody could tell its an aftermarket floor mat. The customization took less than 5 mins, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2005 Cadillac CTS just fine
customer_reviews.text: so I bought the vehicle specific set from Weathertech for my vehicle and those were great, however I bought the tan color and they didn't look so great against my tan interior , and I only bought the front set (paying another 45 bucks for the rears hurt a bit too much) Then I saw this set for what I paid for my front mats, coupled with a $30 gift card I had and I couldn't say no! I laid the old mats over the new ones, trimmed the new ones to shape along the pre-set lines, and installed them with no issues. now I wont have to clean my carpet so often.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan E. Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Stain easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they are made in America they seem to be of good quality but are very hard to clean. I have only had them in my vehicle for about a month and they are showing signs of staining.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Floor Mats for new car
customer_reviews.text: The floor mats are quality and fit perfect. They arrived a week earlier than the estimate delivery date which was perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Alice Bipat

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Honda accord. Got nicely right out of the box. Minor adjustment needed around brake pedal. Recipient very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 3 Gen 2000 4Runner Limited. Only had to cut one small piece of the passenger rear side. Great fit, amazing coverage. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice and cut once
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good. The width on the driver side is about 4” or 5” too narrow. But they work and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Case

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to cut with scissors and they don't smell. These are nice for older vehicles that don't warrant the expense of molded floor liners.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: great mat for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my new CRV which I bought in Dec just as winter was starting. I really wanted the custom fit ones but they are at least twice as much. I think these are great. They're heavy duty, well made, practically custom fit anyway and no odor at all. I bought the front and rears first. I liked them so much a had my wife by the AVM cargo mat for my birthday. My brother liked them enough to buy the custom ones for his new car. Those are really nice but I don't regret spending half as much for these.
customer_reviews.author: lemonhead

customer_reviews.title: Much too narrow. 👎
customer_reviews.text: Much to narrow for my 2003 Ford Escape. Good quality mat if the fit was better. Nothing to trim, just to small. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kdailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Aftermarket rubber mats
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the top of the line Weather Tech but for $50 these are great mats at about 20-25% of the cost. hold melting snow great. easy to clean brush with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: kervorka

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for an infiniti sedan. Was swayed by ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for an infiniti sedan. Was swayed by the WEathertech name, but after cutting to "size", wish i had spent the extra money for the Model specific units. The rubber seems quality, and these should last a couple of winter seasons before looking rough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Great choice custom fit for your car
customer_reviews.text: Great mats! Cut to fit in my new CTS. Factory fabric mats wear and look horrible after short while, so I like to put a sportier mat in car that’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyTampa

customer_reviews.title: They fit & protect.
customer_reviews.text: They went right into our 2018 Honda CRV. We didn’t trim yet but the front driver side will be trimmed a little around the left pedal. They look thick.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for even compact cars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves 2" space open on sides and this is on compact car (corolla).
customer_reviews.author: Real Review

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Mini Countryman and these are a perfect fit. The back mats didn't need any trimming, and the front we just took off a very small portion. Plenty wide enough. Order was delivered on time, and we are very satisfied with this purchase. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the material
customer_reviews.text: The Weather Tech mats I ordered for my truck are awesome and I know they are made of good quality material and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: tomboy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Trim what they where small to start with Would have returned but needed to protect light carpet
customer_reviews.author: G. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the mats
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality and durability of the mats.
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Great for older vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Custom fit mats for this older vehicle are no longer available so these mats are a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hogge

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: U bought these for my daughter's 2003 Rav 4. No trimming needed. They look great and feel durable. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Maneri

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT fit the floor of a 2018 Chevy Traverse
customer_reviews.text: these were advertised to fit a 2018 Traverse and they lack 4inches of width on the front floormats. No protection for the floors from snow, rain, dirt etc. Am returning them immediately. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Berry

customer_reviews.title: Real Weathertech Mats, Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are true weathertech mats, I'm not sure why there is so much confusion on the reviews. They are cut to fit and fit most vehicles, great quality, good feel, and easy to install. One of the best purchases for my car. If you have the big bucks, buy the ones specifically for your vehicle, but for the price this is a fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pontch

customer_reviews.title: Regular Floor Mats
customer_reviews.text: These are regular rubber floor mats and do not justify their higher cost. they do not cover anymore area than others, do not stay in place and the tan color looks filthy after just one day.
customer_reviews.author: dch061

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: They fit in my husband's truck perfectly. And he did not even need to trim them down. The only drawback is the fact that they don't have the higher edges like the ones that are custom-made do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weather tech
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2019 Camaro Don’t like the fact I had to cut them Wish they had been better fit
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were wider
customer_reviews.text: I stalled then in a 2000 Toyota MR2 Spyder. As you can see from the pics, the mats are not very wide and don't cover the entire floor.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Leiting

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price,got them for half the price that weather tech wanted Arrived one day early.Will buy from seller again,great service and fit like a charm,one happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good with few adjustments
customer_reviews.text: These mats are not too bad. Cut easily to the size I needed with a few areas where I had to cut a little more to fit better. One biggest problem I had with it is the fact that they slide. Had to make some adjustments using drapery pins to make the mat stay in one place. The mats come with hooks, but I was not able to use them in my car.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Should have better description  on this product
customer_reviews.text: Lower end product I wanted higher end product, I was thing because of name that's what I was getting,I sent back
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hohn

customer_reviews.title: Quick and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to cut and put in. Good for a quick inexpensive fix
customer_reviews.author: 4alady

customer_reviews.title: It is a great solid product
customer_reviews.text: A solid product. It sad that it does come in for my model Kia Optima 2009. Had to buy this model from weather tech. Work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Well made and does the job, but not a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy, but pssibly too generic. They were easy to trim and fit, but the suggested ways of using the existing floor hooks didn't work, nor did the supplied alternate floor hooks. The passenger side fromt floor mat was actually smaller than the OEM one. Overall a wuality product, but like many things, one size fits all means it doesn't fit any just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and NO stink
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hubby's sx4. Only tiny bit to trim.
customer_reviews.author: PDG

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: A great price and easy to trim to fit my exact car dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Katie Koch

customer_reviews.title: Like the price
customer_reviews.text: Not an inch-perfect fit even after some cutting in my C-Max, but $65 (for all 4) is about the max I'm prepared to pay for high quality dirt collectors. These still look good, stay in place and do the job well for the amount of dirt I expect. Foot pedals seem to be well clear without having to cut away. The existing Ford carpet studs fit ok into the weathertech mat holes to stop driver mat movement so I didn't use the weathertech carpet anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Welg

customer_reviews.title: Its a super buy.
customer_reviews.text: Weathertech needs to do more research mats front & rear don't fit my 2003 jeep liberty
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I've installed 2 sets of these in 2 very different cars and in both cases the fit better (with easy trimming) that the factory ones I removed. The pre-grooved areas make cutting with scissors a cakewalk.
customer_reviews.author: Geek62

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to fit and clean and they stay in place. Very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: abccs

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these on my Gen 1 Toyota Tacoma.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find any 'custom' floor mats to fit my 95 Toyota Tacoma so I got these. I'm very satisfied. They're durable, don't move (pet peeve of mine), and look great. They're also easy to clean, easy to cut for install.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Great for Winter!
customer_reviews.text: These mats fit perfectly in my Taurus, I didn't cut them, I just left them the way they came. They are actually a bit oversize this way, but it's better salt protection for my carpet that way. They are easily washed in the spring for next winter!
customer_reviews.author: D guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit
customer_reviews.text: We already had the WeatherTech fitted for our Jeep and these were perfect for our older truck. Same heavy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to cut to size and fit very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and I am very pleased. I was able to cut them to fit perfectly. I haven’t had them long enough to know how durable they will be but for the money, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Erb

customer_reviews.title: Weather Tech floor mats
customer_reviews.text: All is well with one exception. The drivers side mat was not designed to match the existing holders which prevent the mat from easing forward. Plus this one mat does not fit perfectly in the drivers side location. All others fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin V.

customer_reviews.title: I definitely really like these mats
customer_reviews.text: I definitely really like these mats. They cut very easily and are still rugged enough to hold back dirt and water from getting to the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: Fit well.  Seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like them so far. They fit well. I hope the rubber does not get stiff.
customer_reviews.author: sue maschke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the product and have to send the product back. Recieved a return label but had to pay for the product to be sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: nice heavy mats for about a third the price of the perfect fitting ones...
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, spend a few bucks more on premium mats.
customer_reviews.text: Weathertech is great product, don't settle for a cheaper mat. Go all in and buy the primium product.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Fit well with some cut out and look really nice with high quality floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Order tan color to match with my beige leather interior and used it for my BMW 328i YR2015. I put it over original carpet floor mat. Fit well with some cut out and look really nice with high quality floor mat. Price is 1/3 of laser cut floor mat. I am happy with this Weather Tech Trim to Fit AVM Front and Rear set.
customer_reviews.author: D. To

customer_reviews.title: Easy to custom fit and very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I needed floor mats for a 1977 Winnebago Minnie Winnie we are restoring. Naturally there are no made to fit one available. These are pretty universal and are designed to be easily cut to fit. Ordinary scissors cut them easily. They are thick, tough, and lie flat. Nice mats.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: While they fit ok. They stain incredibly easy! Doesn't matter what you use to clean them they'll always be dirty! Which is absolutely maddening if you enjoy a clean vehicle. Been using weathertech for years. Never will again after this
customer_reviews.author: augustus dupra

customer_reviews.title: Measure mat from inside floor, not old mat, watch their video
customer_reviews.text: My car already had 2 posts, had to punch an extra using a screwdriver and ballpoint pen, other than that it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: The product was excellent for the brand. Fit perfect in my car without any trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Good reviews
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit small, barely covered the floor. Thought they'd be wider mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nissan Frontier 2003 XE Crew Cab
customer_reviews.text: Fit is Great Driver side clips are easy to install. After the First year the Driver side floor mat fell apart from normal non chemical induced use. I tried to contact the seller and weather tech. They were unwilling to help since I purchased them on "AMAZON" WTH !
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend and he loves them. Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: MSPHOENIX1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: 2013 Jeep Grand Cherokee couple of cuts fit great easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if on sale
customer_reviews.text: Well made in the US & they work as described. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is when I came back here to buy a 2nd set for my wifes car, the price was way higher than what I paid for mine (i guess it was a sale when I bought em). For what I paid, I'd buy another set. For this price, I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: ct4now

customer_reviews.title: Only WeatherTech for me
customer_reviews.text: Tough and durable. I always buy these after purchasing a new vehicle, and never disappointed. Prevents carpet wear, easy to remove and clean, deep valleys retain any detritus on the mat. A prior set of WeatherTech mats I purchased in 2000 are still just like new. Don't waste your time with thin, flimsy cheap mats.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation, quality product, if you take the time they look as good as a custom fit solution.
customer_reviews.author: George Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Toyota rav4
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Toyota rav4 be mindful that this doesn’t fit the driver side you will have to cut a portion so the gas pedal is not obstructed. My rav4 is 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Regner

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The mats are easy to trim because there are varied lines and shapes which make up the mat. The rubber is soft and pliable but thick and durable. They easily trimmed to an exact fit. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the snowstorm and they got here really quick (thanks prime). I threw them right in, the fit really well even without trimming in my 03 tl. They are made of thick material that I assume is mostly rubber and they are constructed quite well. They are a bit long so if you want a true custom fit, they will have to be cut. Otherwise I would recommend these to anyone looking for cheaper mats.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to trim the mats to fit perfectly in my 87 4runner. They came with scew in carpet clips too, but so far the stay in place great even without the clips.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fundenberger

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the cut to fit, there are plenty of mats out there for less money but picked these due to name but I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: harold

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut, clean and install. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: michelle cabral

customer_reviews.title: Trim really easy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact they are easy to remove and clean when they get dirty and the dirt doesn't stick like to carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Paula T Allison

customer_reviews.title: measure twice, cut once
customer_reviews.text: good mats for the money, be sure to think through how you want to anchor the mats before you cut. they move around if not hooked into your car's floorboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: protecting floor carpet
customer_reviews.text: i love these mats!...they are the best!...i live in wisconsin where the weather can change quickly...it is nice to have floor mats that really protect my suv, especially in brutal wisconsin winters!
customer_reviews.author: mickbass

customer_reviews.title: Great mats at a more reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was delivered on time and product was as advertised. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: coolpool50

customer_reviews.title: The mats fit very well in my For Edge and didn't need to be trimmed.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to take advantage of a black Friday sale, so price was definitely good . Weathertech are very good quality.

customer_reviews.text: excellent material. unfortunately they don't fit a jeep liberty 2012
